creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
under some conditions, both jetty and tomcat switch to url-based session ids
(appending ;jsessionid=1rdtrpmuc71y5 to urls)

this breaks various matchers in lenya. i havent found a way to prevent the
container from using the url sessions yet.

roku has a patch.

creator: roku@apache.org
text:
I really could not find a better solution for this problem than the attached
patch. I propose to apply it, since this bug is a bummer. 

I also tried to intercept the ";jsessionid" urls in sitemap in order to do a
redirect to the url befor ";jseesionid". That leaded into an endless redirection
loop.
Patch commited. Please verfiy the solution.
creator: roku@apache.org
